ruleBookInfo.kind:
class.uk-card.1@tag.font.4@text&&class.uk-label@text##(.)攻(.)受##$1$2
<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '原创')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅');
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result.replace(/[\S\s]+Scripts.*\s*/, '')
.replace(/([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※/g, '$2$1')
.replace(/[\S\s]*?※※※※※※※※※※※※※/, '收费章节，请付费后阅读。\n')
.replace(/作家想說的話/, '作者有话说')
.replace(/彩蛋內容：/, '【彩蛋内容：】')
.replace(/\s*留言送出完成。/, '')
.replace(/下方留下評論後可完成敲蛋!/, '')
.replace(/\s*信息加載中.../, '');
</js>

'), url: baseUrl+'catalog/', }; book;
